name: Balls Go
description:
'Balls Go' is a simple, but incredibly addictive physics based game.

Drive a simplistic car with bullet balls as far as possible. Jump over the pits, explode walls and shoot bonus holders. Collect fuel, bullet balls and other bonuses which will help you to go further. The game is very dynamic and fast. Each ride will end when car falls into the pit, fuel tank is empty, no bullets or car is overturned. Far distances will reward player with the stars.

Features:

• Physics engine;
• Simplistic colored graphics;
• Simple 2 button control;
• Short game (~5 min.);
• Leaderboard;
• Achievements;
• Sounds and music.
